New Records: Glenn Maxwell hit the fastest WC hundred of all time (in 40 balls)
Glenn Maxwell recorded the fourth-fastest ODI ton
Glenn Maxwell scored his sixth ODI hundred in WCs
Bas de Leede delivered the most expensive over in men's ODI history
Key Match Events: Australia completed the largest victory in WC history
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Maxwell: 'Not something I set out to do. Just situation of the game.'
Glenn Maxwell: 'Just making good decisions. Give myself a little bit of time and give myself a bit of confidence and platform.'
David Warner: 'Special moment for Maxwell. Great to get the fifty and get the hundred.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zampa now has the most wickets at the 2023 WC (13)
The five-time champions earn two points, get a massive NRR boost, and are once again on course for a spot in the semis if they continue this way
Others: The ball was swinging, the boys hit those lengths, and get to penetrate them through to the keeper.
Dutt has to send the helmet back. He walked in with the wrong one. Fitting is important.
